Label.en: It was built by Philippe Auguste in 1200, who wanted to reinforce the outer walls of Paris
Label.fr: Philippe Auguste l'a fait bâtir vers 1200, pour renforcer l'enceinte autour de Paris
Label.es: It was built by Philippe Auguste in 1200, who wanted to reinforce the outer walls of Paris
Label.zh: It was built by Philippe Auguste in 1200, who wanted to reinforce the outer walls of Paris

Label.en: The city was a lot smaller then!
Label.fr: La ville était alors beaucoup plus petite !
Label.es: The city was a lot smaller then!
Label.zh: The city was a lot smaller then!

Label.en: Eventually, as the city expanded, it no longer lay on the outer walls
Label.fr: Au bout d'un moment, Paris a débordé de ses murs
Label.es: Eventually, as the city expanded, it no longer lay on the outer walls
Label.zh: Eventually, as the city expanded, it no longer lay on the outer walls

Label.en: Eventually, as the city expanded, it no longer lay on the outer walls
Label.fr: Au bout d'un moment, au cours de son expansion, la ville a débordé de ses murs
Label.es: Eventually, as the city expanded, it no longer lay on the outer walls
Label.zh: Eventually, as the city expanded, it no longer lay on the outer walls
